android.car.hardware.property

类 CarPropertyManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.car.CarManagerBase
      • android.car.hardware.property.CarPropertyManager

  • public class CarPropertyManager
extends CarManagerBase
    Provides an application interface for interacting with the Vehicle specific properties. For details about the individual properties, see the descriptions in VehiclePropertyIds

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  CarPropertyManager.AsyncPropertyRequest
      An async get/set property request.
      static interface  CarPropertyManager.CarPropertyAsyncErrorCode 
      static interface  CarPropertyManager.CarPropertyEventListener
      Application registers CarPropertyManager.CarPropertyEventListener object to receive updates and changes to subscribed Vehicle specific properties.
      static interface  CarPropertyManager.CarSetPropertyErrorCode 
      static interface  CarPropertyManager.GetPropertyCallback
      A callback getPropertiesAsync(java.util.List<android.car.hardware.property.CarPropertyManager.GetPropertyRequest>, long, CancellationSignal, java.util.concurrent.Executor, android.car.hardware.property.CarPropertyManager.GetPropertyCallback) when succeeded or failed.
      static class  CarPropertyManager.GetPropertyRequest
      A request for getPropertiesAsync(List, long, CancellationSignal, Executor, GetPropertyCallback).
      static class  CarPropertyManager.GetPropertyResult<T>
      A successful result for CarPropertyManager.GetPropertyCallback.
      static class  CarPropertyManager.PropertyAsyncError
      An error result for CarPropertyManager.GetPropertyCallback or CarPropertyManager.SetPropertyCallback.
      static interface  CarPropertyManager.SetPropertyCallback
      A callback setPropertiesAsync(java.util.List<android.car.hardware.property.CarPropertyManager.SetPropertyRequest<?>>, long, CancellationSignal, java.util.concurrent.Executor, android.car.hardware.property.CarPropertyManager.SetPropertyCallback) when succeeded or failed.
      static class  CarPropertyManager.SetPropertyRequest<T>
      A request for setPropertiesAsync(List, long, CancellationSignal, Executor, SetPropertyCallback).
      static class  CarPropertyManager.SetPropertyResult
      A successful result for CarPropertyManager.SetPropertyCallback.

      Read sensors at the rate of 10 hertz

      Read sensors at the rate of 100 hertz

      Read sensors at the rate of 1 hertz

      Read sensors at the rate of 5 hertz

      Error indicating that there is an error detected in cars.

      Error indicating that the property is temporarily not available.
      static int STATUS_ERROR_TIMEOUT
      Error indicating the operation has timed-out.

      • CarPropertyManager

        public CarPropertyManager(Car car,
                          ICarProperty service)
        Get an instance of the CarPropertyManager. Should not be obtained directly by clients, use Car.getCarManager(String) instead.
        参数:
        car - the Car instance
        service - the ICarProperty instance

    • 方法详细资料

      • registerListener

        public boolean registerListener(CarPropertyManager.CarPropertyEventListener carPropertyEventCallback,
                                int propertyId,
                                float updateRateHz)
                         throws CarNotConnectedException
        Register CarPropertyManager.CarPropertyEventListener to get property updates. Multiple callbacks can be registered for a single property or the same callback can be used for different properties. If the same callback is registered again for the same property, it will be updated to new updateRateHz.

        Rate could be one of the following:

        • SENSOR_RATE_ONCHANGE
        • SENSOR_RATE_NORMAL
        • SENSOR_RATE_UI
        • SENSOR_RATE_FAST
        • SENSOR_RATE_FASTEST

        Note:Rate has no effect if the property has one of the following change modes:

        • CarPropertyConfig.VEHICLE_PROPERTY_CHANGE_MODE_STATIC
        • CarPropertyConfig.VEHICLE_PROPERTY_CHANGE_MODE_ONCHANGE

        Note: If listener registers a callback for updates for a property for the first time, it will receive the property's current value via a change event upon registration if the property is currently available for reading.

        For properties that might be unavailable for reading because their power state is off, property change events containing the property's initial value will be generated once their power state is on.

        If updateRateHz is higher than CarPropertyConfig.getMaxSampleRate(), it will be registered with max sample updateRateHz.

        If updateRateHz is lower than CarPropertyConfig.getMinSampleRate(), it will be registered with min sample updateRateHz.

        Note: A property change event will only happen when the property is available. Caller must never depend on the change event to check property's availability. For properties that might be unavailable because they depend on certain power state, caller should subscribe to the power state property (e.g. VehiclePropertyIds.HVAC_POWER_ON for hvac dependant properties) to decide this property's availability.

        参数:
        carPropertyEventCallback - the CarPropertyEventListener to be registered
        propertyId - the property ID to subscribe
        updateRateHz - how fast the property events are delivered in Hz
        返回:
        true if the listener is successfully registered
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if missing the appropriate permission.
        CarNotConnectedException

      • unregisterListener

        public void unregisterListener(CarPropertyManager.CarPropertyEventListener carPropertyEventCallback)
        Stop getting property updates for the given CarPropertyManager.CarPropertyEventListener. If there are multiple registrations for this CarPropertyManager.CarPropertyEventListener, all listening will be stopped.
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if missing the appropriate permission.

      • unregisterListener

        public void unregisterListener(CarPropertyManager.CarPropertyEventListener carPropertyEventCallback,
                               int propertyId)
        Stop getting update for propertyId to the given CarPropertyManager.CarPropertyEventListener. If the same CarPropertyManager.CarPropertyEventListener is used for other properties, those subscriptions will not be affected.
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if missing the appropriate permission.

      • getPropertyList

        public java.util.List<CarPropertyConfig> getPropertyList()
        返回:
        the list of properties supported by this car that the application may access

      • getPropertyList

        public java.util.List<CarPropertyConfig> getPropertyList(<any> propertyIds)
        Checks the given property IDs and returns a list of property configs supported by the car. If some of the properties in the given ID list are not supported, they will not be returned.
        参数:
        propertyIds - the list of property IDs
        返回:
        the list of property configs

        参数:

        返回:

      • getAreaId

        public int getAreaId(int propertyId,
                     int area)
        Returns areaId contains the selected area for the property.
        参数:
        propertyId - the property ID
        area - the area enum such as Enums in VehicleAreaSeat
        返回:
        the AreaId containing the selected area for the property
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the property is not available in the vehicle for the selected area

        返回:

      • isPropertyAvailable

        public boolean isPropertyAvailable(int propertyId,
                                   int areaId)
        Check whether a given property is available or disabled based on the car's current state.
        参数:
        propertyId - the property ID
        areaId - the area ID
        返回:
        true if CarPropertyValue.STATUS_AVAILABLE, false otherwise (eg CarPropertyValue.STATUS_UNAVAILABLE)

      • getBooleanProperty

        public boolean getBooleanProperty(int propertyId,
                                  int areaId)
                           throws CarNotConnectedException
        Returns value of a bool property

        This method may take couple seconds to complete, so it needs to be called from a non-main thread.

        Clients that declare a android.content.pm.ApplicationInfo#targetSdkVersion equal or later than Build.VERSION_CODES#R will receive the following exceptions when request is failed.

        • CarInternalErrorException
        • PropertyAccessDeniedSecurityException
        • PropertyNotAvailableAndRetryException
        • PropertyNotAvailableException
        • IllegalArgumentException

        Clients that declare a android.content.pm.ApplicationInfo#targetSdkVersion earlier than Build.VERSION_CODES#R will receive the following exceptions if the call fails.

        • IllegalStateException when there is an error detected in cars, or when cars denied the access of the property, or when the property is not available and might be unavailable for a while, or when unexpected error happens.
        • IllegalArgumentException when the [propertyId, areaId] is not supported.

        For pre-R client, the returned value is false if the property is temporarily not available.

        参数:
        propertyId - the property ID to get
        areaId - the area ID of the property to get
        返回:
        the value of a bool property, or false for pre-R client if the property is temporarily not available
        抛出:
        CarInternalErrorException - when there is an unexpected error detected in cars
        PropertyAccessDeniedSecurityException - when cars denied the access of the property
        PropertyNotAvailableAndRetryException - when the property is temporarily not available and likely that retrying will be successful
        PropertyNotAvailableException - when the property is not available and might be unavailable for a while.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the [propertyId, areaId] is not supported.
        CarNotConnectedException

      • getFloatProperty

        public float getFloatProperty(int propertyId,
                              int areaId)
                       throws CarNotConnectedException
        Returns value of a float property

        This method may take couple seconds to complete, so it needs to be called from a non-main thread.

        This method has the same exception behavior as getBooleanProperty(int, int).

        参数:
        propertyId - the property ID to get
        areaId - the area ID of the property to get
        返回:
        the value of a float property, or 0 if client is pre-R and the property is temporarily not available
        抛出:
        CarInternalErrorException - when there is an unexpected error detected in cars
        PropertyAccessDeniedSecurityException - when cars denied the access of the property
        PropertyNotAvailableAndRetryException - when the property is temporarily not available and likely that retrying will be successful
        PropertyNotAvailableException - when the property is not available and might be unavailable for a while.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the [propertyId, areaId] is not supported.
        CarNotConnectedException

      • getIntProperty

        public int getIntProperty(int propertyId,
                          int areaId)
                   throws CarNotConnectedException
        Returns value of an integer property

        This method may take couple seconds to complete, so it needs to be called form a non-main thread.

        This method has the same exception behavior as getBooleanProperty(int, int).

        参数:
        propertyId - the property ID to get
        areaId - the area ID of the property to get
        返回:
        the value of a integer property, or 0 if client is pre-R and the property is temporarily not available
        抛出:
        CarInternalErrorException - when there is an unexpected error detected in cars
        PropertyAccessDeniedSecurityException} - when cars denied the access of the property
        PropertyNotAvailableAndRetryException} - when the property is temporarily not available and likely that retrying will be successful
        PropertyNotAvailableException - when the property is not available and might be unavailable for a while.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the [propertyId, areaId] is not supported.
        CarNotConnectedException

      • getIntArrayProperty

        public int[] getIntArrayProperty(int propertyId,
                                 int areaId)
                          throws CarNotConnectedException
        Returns value of an integer array property

        This method may take couple seconds to complete, so it needs to be called from a non-main thread.

        This method has the same exception behavior as getBooleanProperty(int, int).

        参数:
        propertyId - the property ID to get
        areaId - the area ID of the property to get
        返回:
        the value of a integer array property, or an empty integer array if client is pre-R and the property is temporarily not available
        抛出:
        CarInternalErrorException - when there is an unexpected error detected in cars
        PropertyAccessDeniedSecurityException - when cars denied the access of the property
        PropertyNotAvailableAndRetryException} - when the property is temporarily not available and likely that retrying will be successful
        PropertyNotAvailableException} - when the property is not available and might be unavailable for a while.
        IllegalArgumentException} - when the [propertyId, areaId] is not supported.
        CarNotConnectedException

      • getProperty

        public <E> CarPropertyValue<E> getProperty(java.lang.Class<E> clazz,
                                           int propertyId,
                                           int areaId)
                                    throws CarNotConnectedException
        Return CarPropertyValue

        This method may take couple seconds to complete, so it needs to be called from a non-main thread.

        Clients that declare a android.content.pm.ApplicationInfo#targetSdkVersion equal or later than Build.VERSION_CODES#R will receive the following exceptions when request is failed.

        • CarInternalErrorException
        • PropertyAccessDeniedSecurityException
        • PropertyNotAvailableAndRetryException
        • PropertyNotAvailableException
        • IllegalArgumentException

        For R or later version client, the returned value will never be null.

        Clients that declare a android.content.pm.ApplicationInfo#targetSdkVersion earlier than Build.VERSION_CODES#R will receive the following exceptions when request is failed.

        • IllegalStateException when there is an error detected in cars, or when cars denied the access of the property, or when the property is not available and might be unavailable for a while, or when unexpected error happens.
        • IllegalArgumentException when the [propertyId, areaId] is not supported.

        For pre-R client, the returned value might be null if the property is temporarily not available. The client should try again in this case.

        参数:
        clazz - the class object for the CarPropertyValue
        propertyId - the property ID to get
        areaId - the area ID of the property to get
        返回:
        the value of a property
        抛出:
        CarInternalErrorException - when there is an unexpected error detected in cars
        PropertyAccessDeniedSecurityException - when cars denied the access of the property
        PropertyNotAvailableAndRetryException - when the property is temporarily not available and likely that retrying will be successful
        PropertyNotAvailableException - when the property is not available and might be unavailable for a while.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the [propertyId, areaId] is not supported.
        CarNotConnectedException

      • getProperty

        public <E> CarPropertyValue<E> getProperty(int propertyId,
                                           int areaId)
                                    throws CarNotConnectedException
        Query CarPropertyValue with property id and areaId.

        This method may take couple seconds to complete, so it needs to be called from a non-main thread.

        Clients that declare a android.content.pm.ApplicationInfo#targetSdkVersion equal or later than Build.VERSION_CODES#R will receive the following exceptions when request is failed.

        • CarInternalErrorException
        • PropertyAccessDeniedSecurityException
        • PropertyNotAvailableAndRetryException
        • PropertyNotAvailableException
        • IllegalArgumentException

        For R or later version client, the returned value will never be null.

        Clients that declare a android.content.pm.ApplicationInfo#targetSdkVersion earlier than Build.VERSION_CODES#R will receive the following exceptions when request is failed.

        • IllegalStateException when there is an error detected in cars, or when cars denied the access of the property, or when the property is not available and might be unavailable for a while, or when unexpected error happens.
        • IllegalArgumentException when the [propertyId, areaId] is not supported.

        For pre-R client, the returned value might be null if the property is temporarily not available. The client should try again in this case.

        类型参数:
        E - the class type of the property
        参数:
        propertyId - the property ID to get
        areaId - the area ID of the property to get
        返回:
        the value of a property
        抛出:
        CarInternalErrorException - when there is an unexpected error detected in cars.
        PropertyAccessDeniedSecurityException - when cars denied the access of the property.
        PropertyNotAvailableAndRetryException - when the property is temporarily not available and likely that retrying will be successful.
        PropertyNotAvailableException - when the property is not available and might be unavailable for a while.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the [propertyId, areaId] is not supported.
        CarNotConnectedException

      • setProperty

        public <E> void setProperty(java.lang.Class<E> clazz,
                            int propertyId,
                            int areaId,
                            E val)
                     throws CarNotConnectedException
        Set value of car property by areaId.

        If multiple clients set a property for the same area ID simultaneously, which one takes precedence is undefined. Typically, the last set operation (in the order that they are issued to the car's ECU) overrides the previous set operations.

        This method may take couple seconds to complete, so it needs to be called form a non-main thread.

        Clients that declare a android.content.pm.ApplicationInfo#targetSdkVersion equal or later than Build.VERSION_CODES#R will receive the following exceptions when request is failed.

        • CarInternalErrorException
        • PropertyAccessDeniedSecurityException
        • PropertyNotAvailableAndRetryException
        • PropertyNotAvailableException
        • IllegalArgumentException

        Clients that declare a android.content.pm.ApplicationInfo#targetSdkVersion earlier than Build.VERSION_CODES#R will receive the following exceptions when request is failed.

        • RuntimeException when the property is temporarily not available.
        • IllegalStateException when there is an error detected in cars, or when cars denied the access of the property, or when the property is not available and might be unavailable for a while, or when unexpected error happens.
        • IllegalArgumentException when the [propertyId, areaId] is not supported.
        类型参数:
        E - the class type of the given property, for example property that was defined as VEHICLE_VALUE_TYPE_INT32 in vehicle HAL could be accessed using Integer.class.
        参数:
        clazz - the class object for the CarPropertyValue
        propertyId - the property ID to modify
        areaId - the area ID to apply the modification
        val - the value to set
        抛出:
        CarInternalErrorException - when there is an unexpected error detected in cars.
        PropertyAccessDeniedSecurityException - when cars denied the access of the property.
        PropertyNotAvailableException - when the property is not available and might be unavailable for a while.
        PropertyNotAvailableAndRetryException - when the property is temporarily not available and likely that retrying will be successful.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the [propertyId, areaId] is not supported.
        CarNotConnectedException

      • onCarDisconnected

        public void onCarDisconnected()
        从类复制的说明: CarManagerBase
        Handle disconnection of car service (=crash). As car service has crashed already, this call should only clean up any listeners / callbacks passed from client. Clearing object passed to car service is not necessary as car service has crashed. Note that Car*Manager will not work any more as all binders are invalid. Client should re-create all Car*Managers when car service is restarted.
        指定者:
        onCarDisconnected 在类中 CarManagerBase

      • generateGetPropertyRequest

        public CarPropertyManager.GetPropertyRequest generateGetPropertyRequest(int propertyId,
                                                                        int areaId)
        Generate unique get request ID and return to the client.
        参数:
        propertyId - the property ID
        areaId - the area ID
        返回:
        the GetPropertyRequest object

      • generateSetPropertyRequest

        public <T> CarPropertyManager.SetPropertyRequest<T> generateSetPropertyRequest(int propertyId,
                                                                               int areaId,
                                                                               T value)
        Generate unique set request ID and return to the client.
        类型参数:
        T - the type for the property value, must be one of Object, Boolean, Float, Integer, Long, Float[], Integer[], Long[], String, byte[], Object[]
        参数:
        propertyId - the property ID
        areaId - the area ID
        value - the value to set
        返回:
        the CarPropertyManager.SetPropertyRequest object

      • getPropertiesAsync

        public void getPropertiesAsync(java.util.List<CarPropertyManager.GetPropertyRequest> getPropertyRequests,
                               long timeoutInMs,
                               CancellationSignal cancellationSignal,
                               java.util.concurrent.Executor callbackExecutor,
                               CarPropertyManager.GetPropertyCallback getPropertyCallback)
        Query a list of CarPropertyValue with property ID and area ID asynchronously.

        This function would return immediately before the results are ready. For each request, the corresponding result would either be delivered through one resultCallback.onSuccess call if the request succeeded or through one errorCallback.onFailure call if failed. It is guaranteed that the total times the callback functions are called is equal to the number of requests if this function does not throw an exception. It is guaranteed that none of the callback functions are called if an exception is thrown. If the callbackExecutor is null, the callback will be executed on the default event handler thread. If the callback is doing heavy work, it is recommended that the callbackExecutor is provided.

        If the operation is cancelled, it is guaranteed that no more callbacks will be called.

        For one request, if the property's status is not available, errorCallback.onFailure will be called once with STATUS_ERROR_NOT_AVAILABLE.

        For one request, if the property's status is error, errorCallback.onFailure will be called once with STATUS_ERROR_INTERNAL_ERROR.

        参数:
        getPropertyRequests - a list of properties to get
        timeoutInMs - the timeout for the operation, in milliseconds
        cancellationSignal - a signal that could be used to cancel the on-going operation
        callbackExecutor - the executor to execute the callback with
        getPropertyCallback - the callback function to deliver the result
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if missing permission to read one of the specific properties.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if one of the properties to read is not supported.

      • getPropertiesAsync

        public void getPropertiesAsync(java.util.List<CarPropertyManager.GetPropertyRequest> getPropertyRequests,
                               CancellationSignal cancellationSignal,
                               java.util.concurrent.Executor callbackExecutor,
                               CarPropertyManager.GetPropertyCallback getPropertyCallback)
        Query a list of CarPropertyValue with property Id and area Id asynchronously. Same as getPropertiesAsync(List, long, CancellationSignal, Executor, GetPropertyCallback) with default timeout 10s.

      • setPropertiesAsync

        public void setPropertiesAsync(java.util.List<CarPropertyManager.SetPropertyRequest<?>> setPropertyRequests,
                               long timeoutInMs,
                               CancellationSignal cancellationSignal,
                               java.util.concurrent.Executor callbackExecutor,
                               CarPropertyManager.SetPropertyCallback setPropertyCallback)
        Sets a list of car property values asynchronously.

        This function would return immediately before the results are ready. For each request, the corresponding result would either be delivered through one resultCallback.onSuccess call if the request succeeded or through one errorCallback.onFailure call if failed. It is guaranteed that the total times the callback functions are called is equal to the number of requests if this function does not throw an exception. It is guaranteed that none of the callback functions are called if an exception is thrown. If the callbackExecutor is null, the callback will be executed on the default event handler thread. If the callback is doing heavy work, it is recommended that the callbackExecutor is provided.

        If the operation is cancelled, it is guaranteed that no more callbacks will be called.

        If multiple clients set a property for the same area ID simultaneously, which one takes precedence is undefined. Typically, the last set operation (in the order that they are issued to the car's ECU) overrides the previous set operations.

        When the success callback will be called depends on whether waitForPropertyUpdate for each request is set. If this is set to true (by default), the success callback will be called when the set operation is successfully delivered to vehicle bus AND either target value is the same as the current or when the property is updated to the target value.

        When waitForPropertyUpdate is set to false, the success callback will be called as long as the set operation is successfully delivered to vehicle bus.

        Under most cases, client should wait for the property update to verify that the set operation actually succeeded.

        For cases when the property is write-only (no way to get property update event) or when the property represents some action, instead of an actual state, e.g. key stroke where the property's current value is not meaningful, caller must set waitForPropertyUpdate to false.

        For HVAC_TEMPERATURE_VALUE_SUGGESTION, this must be set to false because the updated property value will not be the same as the value to be set.

        参数:
        setPropertyRequests - a list of properties to set
        timeoutInMs - the timeout for the operation, in milliseconds
        cancellationSignal - a signal that could be used to cancel the on-going operation
        callbackExecutor - the executor to execute the callback with
        setPropertyCallback - the callback function to deliver the result
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if missing permission to write one of the specific properties.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if one of the properties to set is not supported.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if one of the properties is not readable and does not set waitForPropertyUpdate to false.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if one of the properties is HVAC_TEMPERATURE_VALUE_SUGGESTION and does not set waitForPropertyUpdate to false.

      • setPropertiesAsync

        public void setPropertiesAsync(java.util.List<CarPropertyManager.SetPropertyRequest<?>> setPropertyRequests,
                               CancellationSignal cancellationSignal,
                               java.util.concurrent.Executor callbackExecutor,
                               CarPropertyManager.SetPropertyCallback setPropertyCallback)
        Sets a list of car property values asynchronously. Same as setPropertiesAsync(List, long, CancellationSignal, Executor, SetPropertyCallback) with default timeout 10s.
